messages.title: Strong Experience
messages.content: Steve Brine has a strong record of action for Winchester & Chandler's Ford. He puts his values into action in a balanced way that's right for our area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Steve will back Boris Johnson's deal and help get Brexit done.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Steve has a strong local and national reputation which can help deliver a majority for Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Steve will back Boris Johnson's deal and help get Brexit done.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live locally in Stanmore with my wife and our two young children who attend our local state schools. If re-elected on December 12th, my sole focus will continue to be our constituency.

politicalExperience.achievements: Steve has a strong record of action for Winchester & Chandler's Ford.

quotes.text: Steve's a committed public servant who has been a great local MP.
Steve is real progressive ... a loss to the liberal tradition in Parliament.

images.caption: Steve with his family and constituents

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet highlights Steve Brine's local connection, support for Boris Johnson's Brexit deal, and his focus on being a strong representative for his constituents if re-elected.
